QuestData.Title: Wyrmskull Watcher
QuestData.Description: Hmm, I'm not certain what we should do. I'm not much of a military planner.$B$BWatcher Moonshade will know what to do. He's heading up our defensive efforts at the Wyrmskull Tunnel to the west at the end of Wyrmskull Bridge. We have a force out there just in case the cultists try anything funny.$B$BPlease, take the note to him with all due haste.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Meeting Note to Watcher Moonshade at the entrance of the Wyrmskull Tunnel in the Blade's Edge Mountains.
QuestData.CompletionText: How can I help you? You bring news from Evergrove?
QuestData.RewardText: It's as I thought, and that's not good!$B$BI've got an idea for how to help you, but first, I was wondering if you might help us out?$B$BYou scratch my back, I'll scratch yours.
